grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
kun reading compounds: 蔑ろ【ないがしろ】(a) slight, disrespect, making light (of), neglect
蔑ろにする【ないがしろにする】to make light of, to ignore, to slight
蔑する【なみする】to set at naught, to ignore, to disregard
蔑む【さげすむ】to scorn, to despise, to hold in contempt, to look down on, to disdain
